placement_heading: Due to commission processing any requested effective date between the 1st and 15th
placement_description: of the month will take place on the 15th or closest workday to the 15th Please fill in the following information so that we may process your Sponsor change request. You must currently be the Enroller and Sponsor when submitting this request Requests to change the Enroller will not be processed through this form and must be completed by submitting an amended application.Requests must be received within sixty (60) days from the date the new Distributor entered. All Sponsor change requests that fall outside of the first sixty days of a Distributorship must follow the guidelines in company’s Policies and Procedures to request a change of Sponsor andor Enroller

website_unsubscribe_warning: Are you sure, you want to unsubscribe
website_personal_info_heading: Include your personal or company information below to provide clients a way to get to know you. Include your name, photo, greeting, as well as a brief introduction to the site. You may also include your phone number and email, which will appear on main page as well. *Please exercise discretion in how you explain company products. You may share how they have helped you personally, but you cannot you cannot make absolute claims as to what the products will do.
website_social_link_heading: The social media links you include will display at the bottom of your website pages. Social media sites provide more outlets for people to interact and understand the products company offers.
website_business_opportunity_text: Are you living your dream? Stewart Hughes, company's Chairman & CEO, explains how company is the place to make your dreams a reality. As a former franchise partner, and now the owner and CEO of company, Stewart provides his unique perspective of why company is the place to help you live your dreams.
website_personal_trainer_text: More than getting healthy or losing weight, company products aim to encourage an ambitious vision of success—but you don’t have to do it alone. The 13-week company Transformation pairs each participant with a personal coach who provides education, accountability, and guidance for individuals truly committed to their own exceptional endeavors.
website_medical_text: Balance has an enduring, medically-proven track record of success. Based on the patented, clinically proven Bios Life formula, taking Balance correctly and consistently will help provide a more mild release of both glucose and insulin into your system. Then, as those levels reduce, your body can finally use its fats cells for energy—burning away those fat reserves.
website_stay_text: With company's PRIME CHALLENGE, you determine what your prime is. This 90-day journey anyone is available to anyone, and is flexible depending on various professions and lifestyles. The Prime Challenge is a program that is tailored to individual needs, and yields positive outcomes.
website_company_text: company's PRIME CHALLENGE is a 90-day journey anyone can go on. It starts with defining your own prime and taking company products for the first time; it ends, three months later, living the prime life. Taking on the Prime Challenge allows you to take control of your life and live to your own prime.
website_congratulations: Congratulations, you have successfully set up your personal company site. The URL of your site is:
website_theme_option_heading: Pick one of following five options as your theme for your website. The theme will dictate which video will play on your homepage, so choose one that best reflects you business style/pitch.
website_bad_words_message: *Some words used in your story are not allowed and were removed. We apologize for the inconvenience.

summary_indicate_intent: By checking this box and submitting this form with payment of my Franchise License fee, I indicate my intent to register as a company Distributor, and certify that I have received, read, understand, and agree to the current company Policies and Procedures and Terms and Conditions linked below.  I have also received, read, understand, and agree to the company Compensation Plan, all of which are incorporated herein and made part of this agreement. Finally, as a company Distributor, I consent to company contacting me at the telephone and fax number(s) and/or e-mail address I have provided with my application.
